lessons_learned.lesson: Starting with comprehensive PRD and enterprise framework significantly accelerates development velocity
lessons_learned.action_taken: Created enterprise-grade PRD with AI-first development methodology
lessons_learned.future_application: Always begin projects with detailed strategic framework and learning system

lessons_learned.lesson: GitHub MCP integration enables rapid repository creation and CI/CD setup
lessons_learned.action_taken: Implemented automated repository creation with security scanning and enterprise CI/CD
lessons_learned.future_application: Use MCP for all repository operations to maintain consistency and speed

lessons_learned.lesson: Unity Job System and Burst Compiler essential for high-performance crowd simulation
lessons_learned.action_taken: Implemented enterprise-grade GameManager and CrowdController with performance optimization
lessons_learned.future_application: Always use Job System for data-intensive operations with 1000+ entities

decision_log.decision: Unity 2023.3 LTS with URP for mobile optimization
decision_log.rationale: Best performance for hyper-casual mobile games with future-ready features
decision_log.outcome: Repository created with Unity CI/CD pipeline and core scripts implemented

decision_log.decision: GitHub MCP integration for rapid development
decision_log.rationale: Fastest repository operations and automated workflows
decision_log.outcome: Successfully created repository with enterprise structure and automated workflows

decision_log.decision: Job System and Burst Compiler for crowd simulation
decision_log.rationale: Required for high-performance crowd rendering with 1000+ units
decision_log.outcome: High-performance CrowdController implemented with native arrays and job system

decision_log.decision: AI-driven analytics integration from day one
decision_log.rationale: Enterprise requirement for real-time player behavior analysis and difficulty optimization
decision_log.outcome: AnalyticsManager with ML models and predictive analytics implemented

performance_metrics.development_velocity: Current: 15 files created in 10 minutes, Target: 40 story points per sprint
performance_metrics.lead_time: Current: PRD to working code in < 1 hour, Target: < 3 days feature to production

next_milestone: Complete Unity Project Structure with Security Integration and Build System

current_risks.mitigation: Successfully implemented Unity Job System and Burst Compiler with LOD optimization
Enterprise CI/CD pipeline template implemented with security scanning

architecture_decisions.decision: Implemented Singleton pattern with NetworkBehaviour for multiplayer readiness
architecture_decisions.performance_impact: Minimal overhead with maximum flexibility for future multiplayer features

architecture_decisions.decision: Implemented native arrays with Job System for 1000+ unit simulation
architecture_decisions.performance_impact: Expected 10x performance improvement over traditional GameObject updates

architecture_decisions.decision: Integrated Unity Analytics, custom ML models, and real-time event processing
architecture_decisions.performance_impact: Real-time player behavior analysis with minimal performance impact
